name: Chalmers tekniska högskola AB
legal: AB, Private/nonprofit university owned by governmental foundation
goal: Chalmers University of Technology conducts research and offers education in technology, science, architecture, and maritime engineering and management.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
The EU Framework Programmes for Research and Innovation;
Proposal for a regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council establishing the European Defence Fund
